house_listing.house_description: This single family home built in 1996 has 4 bedroom(s), 3 bath(s) , 3 car garage. Rooms include dining room, family room, master bedroom. Features include view, patio.

residential_listing_-_feature_details.rooms: Dining Room, Family Room, Master Bedroom

house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Cable TV, Cathedral/Vaulted Ceilings, Ceiling Fan(s), Dining/LivingCombo, Dishwasher, Eat In Kitchen, Great Room, Loft
